languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} союзника на {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} до конца боя. Если на цель при этом действует Приказ командира, в начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у нее будет +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: The Leader increases an ally's resolve by a value equal to the Leader's resolve until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next turn with 1 additional action point.

The Leader increases an ally's resolve by a value equal to the Leader's own resolve until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next turn with 1 additional action point.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's Resolve by a {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with 1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Офицер{/g} увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} союзника на {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} до конца боя. Если на цель при этом действует Приказ командира, в начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у нее будет +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Лидер увеличивает решимость союзника на показатель своей решимости до конца боя. Если на цель при этом действует Приказ командира, в начале следующего хода у нее будет +1 ОД дополнительно.
Лидер увеличивает решимость союзника на показатель своей решимости до конца боя. Если на цель при этом действует Приказ командира, в начале следующего хода у нее будет +1 ОД дополнительно.

Лидер увеличивает {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} союзника на показатель своей решимости до конца боя. Если на цель при этом действует Приказ командира, в начале следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} у нее будет +1 ОД дополнительно.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}使一位盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a}点，效果持续至战斗结束。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友在下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 领袖提高一位盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，数值等同于领袖自身的决心，效果持续至战斗结束。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友在下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时额外获得1点行动点数。
领袖提高一位盟友的{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a}，数值等同于领袖自身的决心，效果持续至战斗结束。 如果该盟友受到指挥之声的效果影响，该盟友在下{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时额外获得1点行动点数。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} de un aliado en +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} hasta el final del combate. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, empezará su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El oficial aumenta la {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} de un aliado en tantos puntos como su propia {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} hasta el final del combate. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, empezará su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} con 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}punto de acción{/g} adicional.

El líder aumenta el {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} de un aliado en tantos puntos como su propio brío hasta el final del combate. Si el objetivo se halla bajo los efectos de Voz de mando, empezará su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} con 1 punto de acción adicional.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes um +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a}. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, beginnt es seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit +1 zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier erhöht {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} eines Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes um einen Wert, der der eigenen {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} des Offiziers entspricht. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, beginnt es seinen nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mit 1 zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}Aktionspunkt{/g}.

Der Anführer erhöht die {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} eines Verbündeten bis zum Ende des Kampfes um einen Wert, der der eigenen Entschlossenheit des Anführers entspricht. Wenn das Ziel unter dem Effekt von Stimme des Kommandos steht, beginnt es seine nächste {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} mit 1 zusätzlichen Aktionspunkt.

languages.text: L'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} renforce la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} d'un allié de {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du commandement, elle commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant avec 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}point d'action{/g} supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Le Leader booste la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} d'un allié d'une valeur égale à sa propre détermination jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant avec 1 point d'action supplémentaire.

Le Leader booste la {uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} d'un allié d'une valeur égale à sa propre détermination jusqu'à la fin du combat. Si la cible est sous l'effet de Voix du Commandement, elle commence son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant avec 1 point d'action supplémentaire.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}は、戦闘終了まで自身の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同じだけ味方のを+{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a}増加させる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}アクションポイント{/g}が+1追加される。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} increases an ally's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a} until the end of combat. If the target is under the effect of Voice of Command, they will start their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} with +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}action point{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リーダーは、戦闘終了まで自身の決断力と同じだけ味方の{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}を増加させる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時のアクションポイントが1追加される。
リーダーは、戦闘終了まで自身の決断力と同じだけ味方の{uip|ResolveBonus|32c0e0539f8548b08780089f8006f54a}を増加させる。 ターゲットが指揮の声の効果を受けている場合、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時のアクションポイントが1追加される。
